Interface IEnquiryController

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryController
public interface IEnquiryController
Interface for Enquiry Controller in the BTO Management System. Defines methods to manage enquiries about BTO projects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Enquiry
    createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String projectId, String enquiryText)
    Creates a new enquiry.
    boolean
    deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId, Applicant applicant)
    Deletes an enquiry.
    List<Enquiry>
    getAllEnquiriesForManager(HDBManager manager)
    Gets all enquiries across all projects accessible to a manager.
    List<Enquiry>
    getAnsweredEnquiries(String projectId)
    Gets a list of answered enquiries for a project.
    List<Enquiry>

    Gets all enquiries by a specific applicant.

    Gets all enquiries for a specific project.

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      Enquiry createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String projectId, String enquiryText)
      Creates a new enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry
      projectId - The ID of the project the enquiry is about
      enquiryText - The text of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The created enquiry if successful, null otherwise

    • updateEnquiry

      boolean updateEnquiry(String enquiryId, String newEnquiryText, Applicant applicant)
      Updates an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to update
      newEnquiryText - The new text for the enquiry
      applicant - The applicant updating the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteEnquiry

      boolean deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId, Applicant applicant)
      Deletes an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to delete
      applicant - The applicant deleting the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • replyToEnquiryAsOfficer

      boolean replyToEnquiryAsOfficer(String enquiryId, String replyText, HDBOfficer officer)
      Replies to an enquiry as an officer.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to
      replyText - The text of the reply
      officer - The officer replying to the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successful, false otherwise

    • replyToEnquiryAsManager

      boolean replyToEnquiryAsManager(String enquiryId, String replyText, HDBManager manager)
      Replies to an enquiry as a manager.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to
      replyText - The text of the reply
      manager - The manager replying to the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successful, false otherwise

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Gets all enquiries by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant who submitted the enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries submitted by the specified applicant

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(String projectId)
      Gets all enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project the enquiries are about
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries about the specified project

    • getEnquiriesForOfficer

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesForOfficer(String projectId, HDBOfficer officer)
      Gets all enquiries for a specific project accessible to an officer.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project the enquiries are about
      officer - The officer requesting the enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries about the specified project

    • getAllEnquiriesForManager

      List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiriesForManager(HDBManager manager)
      Gets all enquiries across all projects accessible to a manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager requesting the enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries for projects managed by the specified manager

    • getAnsweredEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getAnsweredEnquiries(String projectId)
      Gets a list of answered enquiries for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project the enquiries are about
      Returns:
      A list of answered enquiries for the specified project

    • getUnansweredEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getUnansweredEnquiries(String projectId)
      Gets a list of unanswered enquiries for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project the enquiries are about
      Returns:
      A list of unanswered enquiries for the specified project
